video.title: All For Love
video.synopsis: A penniless country boy goes in search of his runaway sister in Bogotá, where he falls for an aspiring singer, but gets tangled up in organized crime.

episodes.synopsis: After returning home from the military, country boy Joaquín is blindsided by a tragedy that sends him to Bogotá, where he meets aspiring singer Irene.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín tries to talk his way into a mechanic job. Irene sets out to untangle her dad from the loan sharks' dirty business. Rocío develops a crush.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Rocío refuses to give up. At work, Joaquín makes an alarming find. Irene and her band perform at La Kalle's concert, where Salvador surprises his wife.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A health crisis forces Irene to put her foot down with her father, and brings her closer to Joaquín. Luis gives his new employee a risky mission.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: During an outing with friends, Joaquin spots a familiar face, and tells Rocío a hard truth. Cuéllar's rage toward his new co-worker gets out of control.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Despite forming a pact with Rocío, Irene is unable to stay away from Joaquín, who tells her parents what his intentions are toward their daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A threatening phone call sends Joaquín racing to the marketplace, where he makes an announcement. The police home in on Luis's shop and launch a raid.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: On her big day, Irene hits a roadblock — literally. At the car repair shop, Joaquín learns cops have surrounded the building and are about to raid it.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Irene demands the truth from Joaquín. Molina drops a bombshell on Luis that turns him against Delio. A car registration puts Alba on Padilla's radar.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: To save Irene's life, Joaquín is forced to make a deal with Delio. None the wiser, Irene meets with Molina to propose an idea, and runs into Alba.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Irene visits the address of Alba's workplace. Alba learns her brother used to work at Luis's car repair shop. Joaquín gets a lesson in car theft.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín's next criminal mission involves working with a team of thieves — including Cuéllar. Delio sends a message to the vendors of the marketplace.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín gathers allies and leads an attempt to overthrow Delio. Irene tries to get Rocío and Otilia to file a complaint with the police about the fire.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín introduces Alba to his in-laws and neighbors. Irene and her band go to a recording studio to make a demo, but not everyone is up to the task.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: With armed backup in tow, Joaquín and Alba set out to get their land back. Irene and her band's demo takes them to the next round: a live audition.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: The audition's results cause false rumors to swirl among the marketplace's neighbors. Joaquín is forced to work with Cuéllar on an ATM heist.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: When security footage of the ATM heist is shown on the news, Irene spots something familiar. Rocío and Brayan follow Joaquín to see what he's up to.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Lauro Sr. visits Cuéllar in prison. Rocío spots Joaquín with the same woman again. During a performance, one of Irene's fans crosses a line.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: In the car repair shop, Irene and Rocío find more than they bargained for. Yeni makes a diagnosis. Joaquín orchestrates a billion-peso heist.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: When the GPS tracker reveals Joaquín is at a large warehouse, Irene calls Molina with her suspicions. Magola makes a decision about her marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Irene realizes Humberto has been mismanaging her. From prison, Cuéllar launches a plan to take down Joaquín. Padilla makes a shocking accusation.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín asks Chacha and Alba to help him. After receiving a heartbreaking message, Irene puts on an emotional performance at the La Kalle festival.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín goes to war against Cuéllar. Diego takes steps to get closer to Irene, who reaches her limit with Humberto and seeks out a new agent.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: The photo of Irene and Diego appears on social media. Irene orders Alba to explain Joaquín's murder charge. Cuéllar receives a new assignment from Delio.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Irene sings in the Mass at prison, unaware danger lurks nearby. Delio orders one of his men to spy on Alba. Brigitte tries to lead her new boss astray.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Just as Brayan starts to win over Alba, Delio shows up. Lubián decides to come clean to Magola. During an interview, Irene is caught off-guard.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Irene is offered an exciting opportunity to open for a famous singer. Joaquín receives hopeful news from his new lawyer. Alba and Brayan make plans.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Irene urges Brayan to tell Molina about Alba's plight. Joaquín returns to court to ask for an appeal. Jealousy comes between Irene and Joaquín.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín uses the loud music at Magola's birthday bash to cover up a noisy break-in nearby. At the party, Brigitte gets drunk again — and loose-lipped.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Irene suspects Joaquín was involved in the break-in and confronts him. Molina comes to a startling realization. Joaquín gathers evidence against Delio.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Brayan asks Yuri to make a special delivery to Alba. When Irene learns what happened to Molina, she asks Joaquín to help the police officer.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Delio flees, but insists on taking Alba with him. Joaquín reveals where Delio is headed to Molina, who sets up an ambush. A record label courts Irene.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Months later, Joaquín risks arrest to return to Bogotá to be with Irene for the birth of their child. Molina plants an undercover cop at the strip club.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín sets in motion a plan to force Diego out of marketplace — and away from Irene. Lubían learns someone has been stealing money from his business.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Brayan confronts Brigitte over her false accusations. Irene begs Joaquín to release Diego from the investment deal. Temptation tests Joaquín's fidelity.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Insisting she can be a mom and performer simultaneously, Irene brings Milagros to a gig. Joaquín finds a way to trick Irene into a face-to-face meeting.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Lubían makes a sacrifice for his son. Peluche and Melo come to a realization about Cuéllar. Milagros's baptism attracts unexpected visitors.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Brayan and Yeni have a heart-to-heart talk. Details of Irene's personal life are leaked to the media. After selling his shop, Lubián approaches Magola.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: With his mom's help, Cuéllar escapes from prison. The police investigate Irene's finances. Working undercover, "Laura" attends a party at Delio's home.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Irene makes a fresh start in her career. Brayan tries to win back Yeni. Laura seizes an opportunity to plant the listening device in the VIP room.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Irene receives flowers from an admiring fan, whom she recognizes. Humberto reaches his limit with his sister. Yuri becomes suspicious of Laura.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín takes advantage of a rare moment when Delio is away from his bodyguards. After receiving an order to kill Joaquín, Cuéllar plants a car bomb.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Irene asks Yuri if anything was going on between Joaquín and Laura. The police announce their findings in the identification of the car bomb victims.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: A tearful memorial is held. Diego asks Irene to be more than just his friend. A rash of motorbike thefts spurs Molina to plant GPS trackers on targets.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Alba faces increasing pressure to move away from the plaza. Cuéllar sends an offer to Irene. Juan Gabriel arrives at the marketplace.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Cuéllar tempts Yeni with a new bicycle. One of Cuéllar's men arrested in the raid reveals a key piece of info to Molina. Alba gets unexpected news.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: After escaping from Delio's home, Alba takes refuge with Irene and shares the news she just received. Yeni brings two referrals to Cuéllar.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Irene's recent La Kalle interview leads to an exciting new gig, where she gets a big surprise during her performance. Cuéllar threatens Juan Gabriel.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Diego expresses a wish that elicits a strong reaction from Irene. Joaquín arrives in Bogotá. Cuéllar catches Irene alone and corners her.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Cuéllar gets a surprise visitor. Yeni's dad changes his mind — but not how she'd hoped he would. To keep everyone safe, Alba decides to return to Delio.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Julia worms her way back into Irene's career. Salvador finds himself falling in love. Cuéllar sends his men to collect the payment Juan Gabriel owes.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Irene reads the letter that was left at her home. Alba shows Joaquín what he's missing out on. Salvador and Brigitte go public with their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Irene learns several of her neighbors have been getting bicycles from Cuéllar. Rocío's sister comes for a visit and sees Juan Gabriel's true colors.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: When Magola's meddling pushes Brigitte too far, Lubían questions his fiancée's motives. Rocío finds a promising new man online and meets him for a date.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Maicol tries to avoid Cuéllar. In her determined quest for love, Rocío's spending skyrockets. The wedding day arrives and Molina launches her operation.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Irene and Diego must decide how they want to proceed. Maicol asks Salvador for a favor. Lubián and Brayan have a heart-to-heart talk about Alba.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín tries to recruit Maicol and asks Salvador to help him see his child. Brayan and Alba's family meal goes awry. Julia trash-talks about Irene.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Julia is livid when Irene invites Alexis onstage during her next gig. Salvador secretly takes Milagros to see her dad. Diego asks Rocío for advice.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Joaquín takes action against Cuéllar's collectors. Salvador comes to a horrifying realization and sinks into despair. Brayan returns from Bellavista.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Magola plants a worry about Alba's past into Brayan's head. Joaquín assigns Maicol a mission. Diego gives Rocío news that evokes a strong reaction.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Irene asks Rocío why she wanted to keep Diego's wedding suit. Cuéllar tasks Maicol with finding out the details of Irene's personal tastes and habits.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Maicol tells Joaquín what Cuéllar is planning to do. The police identify Milagros's new babysitter. Diego spends his last days in Bogotá with Rocío.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Rocío regrets taking the passport and races to give it back to Diego. Molina confronts Salvador, Alba and Yuri at the hostel and orders them to talk.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Diego tells Rocío they need to talk. When Joaquín catches Irene alone and tries to prevent her from going to Samán Plaza, she gives him an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Chacha ignores Joaquín's instructions and confronts Cuéllar by herself. The police raid Cuéllar's warehouse. A hospitalized Maicol becomes a target.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Rocío finds a way that Irene might still be able to perform at the Great Concert of Defiance. Joaquín reveals to his lawyer what he's planning to do.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: During a chat with Yuri, Alba slips up. The birth of a new family member gives Lubián and Magola a chance to reconcile with Brayan and Alba.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Rocío spots Diego and Irene conspiring and suspects the worst. Joaquín realizes one part of his plan to turn himself in safely isn't going to work.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: The bank heist begins. Elena tells Maicol what her son has planned. At the Great Concert of Defiance, Irene goes onstage to fulfill her lifelong dream.
episodes.title: Episode 69
